duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the sales activities across Minnesota, Wisconsin, Iowa, and Illinois.
Grow the current client base by renewing contracts, cross-selling new services, and maintaining relationships.
Aggressively build new clients through networking, cold calling, and other sales and marketing activities.
Make presentations to clients, facility management groups, and other organizations to provide education regarding codes and promote the company and its services.
Represent the company at trade shows and conferences.
Maintain the company's contact management database, complete weekly sales reports, and meet with management to ensure performance and results.
Travel to meet with prospective clients and attend company meetings as required.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2 years of experience working in a high-energy sales team environment
